title: Expert Seeks Halachic Guidance
body: Dr. Sherman Silber, a world-renowned fertility expert, visited Yerushalayim for a halachic consultation with Rav Moshe Shternbuch on new medical methods for infertility.

title: Letter of Chizuk to Ariel Shamai
body: Gedolei Torah send Ariel Shamai, a yeshiva bochur who completed a prison term for refusing to report to the IDF, a rare letter of chizuk at Yeshivas Ateres Shlomo.
